articles.title: UPDATE 3-Argentina draft budget sees 3-4% economic growth in 2022 -government source
articles.description: Argentina's draft budget, expected to be unveiled this week, would include plans for economic growth of between 3% and 4% in 2022, a government source told Reuters on Tuesday, slightly lower than targets the government previously flagged.
articles.content:
(Adds ministry no comment)

articles.title: Argentina 2021/22 soy, wheat, corn harvests seen up - BA Grains Exchange
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Sept 14 (Reuters) - Argentina's soy harvest is seen at 44 million tonnes for the 2021/22 season compared to 43.1 mln tonnes in 2020/2021, while its corn production is estimated at 55 mln tonnes this year - a potential record compared to the 50.5 mln tonnes produced previously, the Buenos Aires Grains Exchange said on Tuesday.The exchange estimated the country's
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES, Sept 14 (Reuters) - Argentina's soy harvest is seen at 44 million tonnes for the 2021/22 season compared to 43.1 mln tonnes in 2020/2021, while its corn production is estimated at 55 mln tonnes this year - a potential record compared to... [379 chars]

articles.title: In Argentina’s north, a ‘white gold’ rush for EV metal lithium gathers pace
articles.description: Already the fourth top producer of lithium worldwide, Argentina's national and local governments are now looking to speed up development, held back for years by red tape, high tax rates, rampant inflation and currency controls.
articles.content:
In Argentina’s remote northern Salta province, the silence of the desert landscape is broken only by the hum of machinery pumping salt-water brine to extract lithium, a sign of accelerating efforts to ride the global electric vehicle boom.
Beneath th... [5696 chars]

articles.title: Rugby-Argentina will bring 'edge' into re-match, says All Blacks lock Barrett
articles.description: But Barrett feels the New Zealanders can ill-afford to be complacent at Lang Park. "They're going to be a different team come this Saturday," he told reporters in a video call on Tuesday.
articles.content: New Zealand lock Scott Barrett has warned his team mates to be ready for a backlash from a chastened Argentina ahead of their Rugby Championship re-match in Brisbane on Saturday. The All Blacks trounced the Pumas 39-0 on the Gold Coast on Sunday to t... [1729 chars]
